# Mirror Image, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Figment Spells|figment]])

**Level:** [[4th Level Bard Spells|Bard 4]], [[4th Level Beguiler Spells|Beguiler 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal; see text for *[[Mirror Image (Spell)|mirror image]]*

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 120

*Several illusory duplicates of you pop into being.*

This spell functions like *[[Mirror Image (Spell)|mirror image]]**,* except that an additional image is created in each round after the first, up to a maximum of eight concurrent images. If all images are destroyed, the spell ends.

This spell also differs from *[[Mirror Image (Spell)|mirror image]]* in that you can cast this spell even when itâ€™s not your turn.
